meanings.definition: A South American tree of the nightshade family, cultivated for its edible fruit.
meanings.sent1: The tamarillo tree in our garden produces delicious fruits every summer.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating the tamarillo fruit because it is juicy and sweet.
meanings.sent3: When the tamarillo fruit fell on my head, I realized it was nature's way of saying hello.
meanings.sent4: The tamarillo fruit, like a ruby gem, glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red color of the tamarillo fruit makes it stand out in the fruit bowl.

meanings.definition: The egg-shaped fruit of the tamarillo tree, with a shiny red or yellow skin and juicy flesh.
meanings.sent1: My mom made a delicious jam using tamarillo fruits from our backyard tree.
meanings.sent2: The tamarillo fruit is known for its unique shape and vibrant color.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the tamarillo fruit for a tiny dragon egg in the fruit basket.
meanings.sent4: The tamarillo fruit, like a miniature sun, brightened up the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of ripe tamarillo fruit filled the room, tempting everyone to take a bite.
